_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:53:59 using v2.1
title: What proportion of doctors leaves and joins the NHS ever month?
analysis_commentary: Leaving and joining trends for doctors resemble those for all staff. We can observe a 2.3% leaving rate peak in March 2013 and a 1.6% joining rate peak in July 2013. Twelve months moving averages are rather stable for leaving rates while there appears to be a small upward trend for the doctor joining rate from November 2013.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, National Workforce Statistics
